Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: クルルルゥ……
Entry.EnglishText: Coo... Coo...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワン！
Entry.EnglishText: Woof!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマは力仕事しかできないから、 ヒューマの言うとおりに しなければいけないんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma can only do heavy lifting, so we have no choice but to do what Huma say.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう教わったよ？
Entry.EnglishText: That's what I've been taught.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマに追い出されて、 この街に来たんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We moved here after being kicked out of our old town by Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 前は別に好きでも 嫌いでもなかったけど、 今はすごく嫌いになっちゃった!!
Entry.EnglishText: I didn't care for them much before, but now I really hate them!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは あっち行っちゃえ！
Entry.EnglishText: Go somewhere else, Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 食材屋のおばさんは ガジュマもヒューマも仲良くしろって 言うんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: The lady at the grocery store told me that Huma and Gajuma should get along together, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなのムリだよね！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not gonna!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマなんて キライだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I hate Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場で働いてる人たち、 カワイソウ！
Entry.EnglishText: I feel so bad for the people working in the factory!

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分勝手なヒューマたちの 下で働かなきゃいけないなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: They've gotta work under those selfish Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん……!! あっち行って！
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph! Leave me alone!

Entry.JapaneseText: 前に来たヒューマのお姉さんに おいしいチョコ、もらっちゃった！
Entry.EnglishText: A Huma lady came by here earlier and gave me some chocolate!

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱ、ヒューマの事、 好きかも……！
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe I might like Huma, after all!

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場で働いてる人たち、 カワイソウ！
Entry.EnglishText: I feel so bad for the people working in the factory!

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分勝手なヒューマたちの 下で働かなきゃいけないなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: They've gotta work under those selfish Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは あっち行っちゃえ！
Entry.EnglishText: Go somewhere else, Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたの……!? 大丈夫なの……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What's wrong...!? Are you alright?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>お兄ちゃん、 セレーナさんはボクが守るよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you worry, <Tytree>! I'll make sure Selena is safe!

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場の方はまだ 少しもめてるみたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: They still seem to be having trouble at the factory...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長さんが少しずつ 悪いところを直そうって、 色々と考えてくれてるみたいだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...But the factory manager seems to be putting a little more thought into fixing what is wrong there...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場でかくれんぼしてたら、 怒られちゃったよ…… チェッ……
Entry.EnglishText: They got mad at me for playing hide and seek in the factory... Lame...
